citations.desc: Access and inspection of records and property; submission of itineraries.
citations.narrative:
A responsible adult was not available to accompany APHIS Officials during the inspection process at 12:00pm on January
25, 2021.
Upon arrival to the facility, the inspector attempted to contact the licensee via phone. The phone numbers on file for the
facility were called; no option was available to leave a voicemail. Additional calls were made, and the inspector honked
their horn numerous times. The inspector waited 40 minutes before leaving the facility.
End Section

narrative:
2.126(b) 
   
Access and inspection of records and property; submission of itineraries. 
A responsible adult was not available to accompany APHIS Officials during the inspection process at 12:00pm on January 
25, 2021. 
 
Upon arrival to the facility, the inspector attempted to contact the licensee via phone. The phone numbers on file for the 
facility were called; no option was available to leave a voicemail. Additional calls were made, and the inspector honked 
their horn numerous times. The inspector waited 40 minutes before leaving the facility. 
 
 
 
End Section
